title: hey can league run on the asus zenbook 13 ux391ua
body: Im thinking of buying a asus zenbook 13 ux391ua it has a Intel® Core™ i7-8550U processor 1.8 GHz (8M Cache, up to 4.0 GHz), 16ram, 512GB M.2 SSD, and a intel uhd graphics 620. Can this laptop run very high settings and how much fps. If it cant run high how much will it run on medium. The thing that is worrying me is the intel graphics it not a dedicated gpu thats why i want to know. pls reply
